sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
breaks
ali kadar človek
breaks something
, se tisti predmet nenadoma razleti na dva ali več kosov, ker ga nekaj zadene ali ker ga spustimo na tla.

seg.quote: The string broke.
He has broken a window.

sense.def:
Kadar orodje ali del stroja
breaks
ali kadar človek
breaks it
, je orodje ali stroj pokvarjen in ne deluje več.

To break a rule, promise, or agreement
pomeni storiti nekaj, kar se ne sklada s tistim pravilom, obljubo ali sporazumom.

seg.quote: We're not breaking the law.

sense.def:
To break a connection or situation
pomeni kar na lepem končati zvezo ali položaj, ki je trajal nekaj časa.

seg.quote: They cannot break the habit.

sense.def:
To break with a group of people
pomeni ne imeti več stikov z neko skupino ljudi.
To break with a way of doing things
pomeni, da nečesa ne delamo več tako kot doslej.

seg.quote: He broke with precedent by making his maiden speech on a controversial subject.
...their break with the Labour Party in 1968.

sense.def:
To break something
pomeni zmanjšati vpliv nečesa.

seg.quote: Fortunately, the tree broke her fall.

sense.def:
To break someone
pomeni nekomu preprečiti uspeh ali uničiti kariero.

To break a piece of news to someone
pomeni nekomu povedati novico.

seg.quote: It was Ted who broke the news to me.

sense.def:
To break for a meal
pomeni prekiniti delo zaradi obroka hrane.

seg.quote: We broke for tea.

sense.def:
A break
je tudi kratko obdobje, ko počivamo ali delamo kaj drugega kot prej.

seg.quote: We all met in the pub during the lunch break.
The doctors had worked without a break.

sense.def:
A break
je tudi ugodna priložnost;

seg.quote: His big break came last spring in Australia.

sense.def:
To break a record
pomeni doseči boljši uspeh, kot so ga v določeni dejavnosti dosegli dotlej.

seg.quote: Oliver Barrett was out to break his New York-Boston speed record.

sense.def:
Kadar dan
breaks
, se začne svitati, potem ko se noč konča.

Kadar val
breaks
, se prevali najvišji del vala.

To break a secret code
pomeni ugotoviti, kako je mogoče prebrati šifrirano sporočilo.

Kadar deški glas
breaks
, se za stalno poglobi.

To break one's opponent's serve
pri tenisu pomeni zmagati v igri, v kateri servira nasprotnik.

To break free
ali
to break someone's hold
pomeni na silo se rešiti nekoga, ki nas drži.

seg.quote: He was trying to break free.
He had my hands behind my back in a hold that was impossible to break.

sense.def:
Kadar podjetje
breaks even
, nima ne dobička ne izgube.

Kadar stroj ali vozilo
breaks down
, neha delovati.

seg.quote: The car broke down three miles outside Winchester.

sense.def:
Kadar sistem, načrt ali razgovor
breaks down
, spodleti zaradi kakšne težave ali nesporazuma.

seg.quote: The talks broke down over differences on doctrine.

sense.def:
Kadar neka snov
breaks down
ali kadar nekaj
breaks it down
, se spremeni zaradi kemičnega procesa.

seg.quote: Enzymes break down proteins by chemical action.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
breaks down
, začne jokati.

To break down a door or barrier
pomeni tako močno udariti po vratih ali pregradi, da se podre.

Kadar človek
breaks in
, na silo pride v stavbo.

To break in on someone's conversation or activity
pomeni prekiniti pogovor ali dejavnost drugih.

To break into a building
pomeni na silo vstopiti v stavbo.

To break into
pomeni tudi, da nekdo nenadoma začne nekaj delati.

seg.quote: Rudolph broke into a run.
The boys broke into applause.

sense.def:
To break into a new area of activity
pomeni začeti se ukvarjati z neko novo dejavnostjo.

seg.quote: ...women wanting to break into the labour market.

sense.def:
Kadar neki del
breaks off
ali kadar človek
breaks it off
, se tisto odlomi ali odtrga od nečesa drugega.

seg.quote: Garroway broke off another piece of bread.

sense.def:
To break off
pomeni nenadoma opustiti tisto, kar počnemo ali govorimo.

To break off a relationship
pomeni končati razmerje ali odnos.

seg.quote: She broke off her engagement.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj, na primer pretep ali bolezen,
breaks out
, se nenadoma začne.

To break out in a rash or a sweat
, ali kadar
a rash or a sweat breaks out
, se na koži nenadoma pojavi izpuščaj ali znoj.

cit.quote: pokazati se, pojaviti se; izločiti se

seg.quote: She felt the sweat break out on her forehead.

sense.def:
To break through a barrier
pomeni, da se nam posreči izsiliti pot skozi pregrado.

seg.quote: I broke through the bushes.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
breaks up
ali kadar človek
breaks something up
, se tisto loči ali razdeli na več manjših delov.

seg.quote: The wood broke up into a shower of fragments.
...bacteria that break up decaying vegetation.

sense.def:
To break up with one's wife, husband, girlfriend, or boyfriend
pomeni končati razmerje z ženo, možem, dekletom ali fantom;

Kadar neka dejavnost
breaks up
ali kadar nekdo
breaks it up
, se ta dejavnost konča.

seg.quote: The party had just broken up.
The policemen broke the fight up.

sense.def:
Kadar šole ali njihovi učenci
break up
, se semester konča in za učence se začnejo počitnice.
